document.docAuthor: Benda, Petr, Vallo, Peter & Reiter, Antonín
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of the genus Asellia (Chiroptera: Hipposideridae) with a description of a new species from southern Arabia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic revision of the genus Asellia (Chiroptera: Hipposideridae) with a description of a new species from southern Arabia

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Department of Zoology, National Museum (Natural History), Václavské nám. 68, CZ- 115 79 Praha 1, Czech Republic & Department of Zoology, Faculty of Science, Charles University, Viničná 7, CZ- 128 44 Praha 2, Czech Republic & Corresponding author: E-mail: petr _ benda @ nm. cz
